name: Save The Forest (itch) (Jayanth Varma)
description:
Play as the Travelers and embark on a journey to help humanity thrive by collecting Runes and defeating Mutants.

But be careful, Nature will do whatever it takes to make sure no one can lay hands on it's Runes

Controls:

W, A, S, D keys to navigate

E to interact

Mouse to attack and defend
